SEARCH
Package dev.Pedro.movies_api.service

Class ReviewService

java.lang.Object
dev.Pedro.movies_api.service.ReviewService
@Service public class ReviewService extends Object
Service class responsible for handling Review operations.

This class provides methods to create, update, and delete reviews for movies. It interacts with MovieService, ReviewRepository, and MongoTemplate to ensure proper association of reviews with movies.

Security is enforced externally using ReviewSecurity to verify ownership of reviews.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReviewService

      public ReviewService(ReviewRepository reviewRepository, MovieService movieService, org.springframework.data.mongodb.core.MongoTemplate mongoTemplate, MovieRepository movieRepository)
      Constructs the ReviewService with required repositories and services.
      Parameters:
      reviewRepository - the repository for persisting reviews
      movieService - the service for managing movies
      mongoTemplate - the MongoTemplate for advanced queries and updates
      movieRepository - the repository for managing movies

  • Method Details

    • createReview

      public Review createReview(ReviewRequest newReview)
      Creates a new review and associates it with the specified movie.

      Steps performed:

      • Checks if the movie exists
      • Creates a new review with the currently authenticated user as the author
      • Inserts the review into the database
      • Pushes the review ID into the corresponding movie's reviewIds list
      Parameters:
      newReview - the request containing review body and movie IMDb ID
      Returns:
      the created Review object
      Throws:
      MovieNotFoundException - if the target movie does not exist

    • deleteReview

      public void deleteReview(String imdbId, String id)
      Deletes a review and removes its reference from the associated movie.

      Steps performed:

      • Verifies the movie exists
      • Checks if the review belongs to the movie
      • Removes the review ID from the movie's reviewIds list
      • Deletes the review from the database
      Parameters:
      imdbId - the IMDb ID of the movie
      id - the ID of the review to delete
      Throws:
      ReviewNotFoundException - if the review does not exist or does not belong to the movie

    • updateReview

      public Review updateReview(ReviewRequest reviewRequest, String id)
      Updates the content of a review.

      Steps performed:

      • Verifies the movie exists
      • Checks if the review belongs to the movie
      • Updates the review body
      • Saves the updated review in the database
      Parameters:
      reviewRequest - the request containing the new review body and movie IMDb ID
      id - the ID of the review to update
      Returns:
      the updated Review object
      Throws:
      ReviewNotFoundException - if the review does not exist or does not belong to the movie
